text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet observation-vitalsign-bmi

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP35925-4 (Body mass index), PROPERTY = LP6852-0 (Ratio), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP310005-6 (^Patient) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)

name: VitalSignsBMI
title: Vital Signs - BMI
description: This value set defines the set of LOINC codes considered to be appropriate for representing body mass index (BMI) vital sign measurements in Observation.code.
